element.name: Hermit 2 - The Cave by MaryAnn42, Traditional Cache (1.5/1.5)
element.description:
IMPORTANT: Bring your own pen. Please re-hide carefully. Park Opening Times
Nov – Jan 9.00 – 16.30 Feb 9.00 – 17.00 Mar 9.00 – 18.00 Apr 9.00 – 20.00 May - Aug 9.00 – 21.00 Sept 9.00 – 20.00 Oct 9.00 – 18.00
element.long-description: Located in St. Enda's Park, nestling in the foothills of the Dublin mountains. This cache is a small black container, hidden close to a cave-like folly. There are many other odditys/follies hidden waiting to be found by people strolling around these beautiful grounds.

ul.li:
2010-05-15T19:00:00Z : Didn't find it by Timmolly
Searched a while but looking at the comments now maybe we weren't in the right place. Will have to go back again soon!

2010-04-05T19:00:00Z : Found it by didi2206
Wow quite a tricky one but worth it in the end... Sunni and I searched for ages, gave up and went to the other one in the park.. when we found that one we had a better idea what to be looking for and found this straight away!! Great fun TFTC!!!

2010-04-03T19:00:00Z : Found it by WeeBookWorm
Found when out with my parents (Frezeluberz) TFTC

2010-04-03T19:00:00Z : Found it by CheekyCheetah
Found when out with my parents (Frezeluberz) TFTC

2010-04-03T19:00:00Z : Found it by Frezeluberz
Tried this cache last year before the Easter Eggstravaganza but was running late and only got 5 minutes at it. Back this year and we had all the time in the world ... we were going to need it. Turns out we weren't looking in the right area. Fortunately enough though, AbbeyAckbar and B.Bubbles turned up. I think it was AbbeyAckbar who were able to identify that we were searching in completely the wrong place. They have found it previously ... but couldn't remember where :( The hunt contniued, but this time in the right location. Soon enough the hide was discovered. Nice camo and good hide. TFTC.

2010-02-13T20:00:00Z : Found it by Kersti.com
After reading the description properly and deciding to trust the GPS we finally headed to the correct general location. C skipped right over the cache but once I got there I had it in hand within a few seconds.

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description: Located in St. Enda's Park, nestling in the foothills of the Dublin mountains. This cache is a small black container, hidden close to a cave-like folly. There are many other odditys/follies hidden waiting to be found by people strolling around these beautiful grounds.
